properties.description: Posted by Pdkain15 North Walnut Street, West Chester, PaMy favorite West Chester bar, where we hung out with my friends, had a dance contest.

properties.name: Automatic Slims
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain733 Washington street, new york, nyCrowded, good 80s music, BBH hangout, famous photo of Wylie and her sisters dancing on the bar.

properties.name: BBH
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain7 w 22nd street, new york, nyWhere we met, fell in love, learned how to work with each other and made good friends.

properties.name: Baby
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain48 east 43rd street, new york, nyWe go here to see our baby moving around in the womb, to hear its heartbeat and to ask about headaches, heartburn and gas.

properties.name: Bansha Castle
properties.description: Posted by PdkainWhere we spent a week in Ireland, saw beautiful countryside and villages, ate crappy food, drank Guinness, played pompene, won the points competition, and I almost died sprinting back to house after losing bill-guessing contest.

properties.name: Bar on Roof of Met
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain1000 fifth avenue, new york, nyEnjoyed view of Central Park after paying less than the suggested donation for entry, after long winding hike through the ramble, with Colin and Claudia

properties.name: Bellagio (hotel and casino)
properties.description: Posted by System Bellagio (hotel and casino)

properties.name: Best Sushi Ever
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain17 Railroad Street, Great Barrington, MADiscovered during our 7/4/05 weekend trip to upstate CT & MA. I went from hating scallops to loving them. We also went on a nice bike ride and very hot rowboat trip that weekend.

properties.name: Black Rock State Park
properties.description: Posted by System  Route 6, Waterbury, CTBlack Rock State Park (860) 283-8088

properties.name: Boat Basin
properties.description: Posted by PdkainW. 79th St., New York, NYWhere we watch sunsets, meet friends, congratulate ourselves for picking the perfect neighborhood to live, had our engagement photos taken.

properties.name: Cape Cod
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain415 Ireland way, eastham, maHome of Mom, Dad, Mama. Where we go to the beach, take slow moving boat rides, saw Jan and Bruce & later Erin and Chris get married, took a dune tour, rode and ran on bike trail, played tennis.

properties.name: Carson Iceberg Wilderness
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain19777 Greenley Road, Sonora, CA, 95370Where we camped with Cullen. Hiked in, swam in clear lake, ate best meal ever consisting of pasta, cheese, and peppers, slept on rock under stars.

properties.name: Central Park
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain Where Wylie finished her latest marathon, in 2005. Where I learned to tolerate and sometimes enjoy running. Where I ride my folding bike. Where we go for occasional picnics, walks, and concerts. Where we will hopefully take our kids to play.

properties.name: Central Park, New York
properties.description: Posted by System Central Park, New York

properties.name: Christmas Eve Dinner 2006
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain415 Ireland way, eastham, maWe told the Kain family I was pregnant at the dinner table. Peter said something like "whoever can guess where the fetus at the table is sitting wins" and he passed around our ultrasound picture. No one had any idea!!

properties.name: Cold Spring Hike
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain Rode train up from Grand Central with various friends and coworkers. Fall, 2000. Hiked, walked around, hung out at bar in village of Cold Spring.

properties.name: Cyril's
properties.description: Posted by PdkainMontauk Hwy, Amagansett, NYHome of BBC\'s, Cyril, hours of fun, free parking, Scrabble

properties.name: Drinkland
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain339 e 10th street, new york, nyWhere we enjoyed several late nights--one New Years eve (2002?), recently with Kelli, Samantha, Pope, meeting Eric and Julie

properties.name: Home
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain146 west 82nd street new york, nySince October 28, 2004

properties.name: Home of the best cheese plate
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain35 W 64th street, new york, nyPicholine. We\'ve been twice so far. Cheeseplate is even better several days later.

properties.name: Hunter Mountain
properties.description: Posted by PdkainMain St, Hunter, NYWhere we had a much-needed weekend away, stayed in a strange Catskills hotel with an astro-turf lined grotto, met some upper west side neighbors, went skiing, and enjoyed our fireplace.

properties.name: Hunter Mountain Ski Area
properties.description: Posted by SystemMain St, Hunter, NYHunter Mountain Ski Area (518) 263-4223

properties.name: Mary Cheney Live
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain183 west 10th street, new york, nyWe saw her impressive stand-up routine, where she talked about how her mom cooked everything in a crockpot. Later, we saw a Golden Girls episode re-enacted by drag queens.

properties.name: Miami vacation
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain1601 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, FLThanksgiving, 2005. Jeff Hoffman says hi. We used that to get a table at Joe\'s Stone Crab, as did everyone else. We rented bikes and rode along highways until I got hit in the elbow by a van. We should have stayed at the pool.

properties.name: Middlesex
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain1400 Lowell Road, Concord, maWylie\'s high school. Where we visited twice. Saw her carving in wall, went hiking with Devin and Ali.

properties.name: Miglio house
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain264 Kings Point Road, East Hampton, NYWhere we spent many entertaining summer weekends--illegally at the Driftwood beach and pool, later at Cyrils\', followed by bbq, croquet, riding messed up children\'s bikes, yelling Struggles, playing board games, taking expensive cabs, and interesting nights out.

properties.name: My hospital stay
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain 301 E 17th Street, New York, NYAfter shoulder surgery, where Wylie visited me, and we took an intelligence test with my strange bird-loving roommate, ate bad food, and managed to have some fun.

properties.name: My old apartment
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain306 mott street 10012Where we had good parties, bbq\'s, cinco de mayos, karaoke-d, and slept late after many late nights

properties.name: My railroad apartment
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain171 e 92nd street, new york, nyWhere we had our first \'date\'. Drank grapefruit juice, Wylie left some jewelry that had to be picked up. Later tried e, looked at all my photos together, walked to Carl Shurz park. Ate breakfast at a nearby diner early one saturday morning.

properties.name: Our Airport Odyssey
properties.description: Posted by PdkainWhere we waited out a snowstorm together after Christmas, talking, making stock picks, and enjoying a free hotel room.

properties.name: Our Second Vacation
properties.description: Posted by PdkainWhere we ate jerk chicken & Jamaican breakfast food, drank Blue Mountain coffee, went horseback riding and met Hedo people. I had a bad experience with a brownie. We sat by the pool surrounded by rocks, read Mary Wells\' book, and went snorkeling.

properties.name: Our Third Vacation
properties.description: Posted by PdkainHotel Deseo, slept to sounds of jungle, ate delicious Argentinian food, rode Mopeds and visited ruins in Cozumel, stayed at strange place with nice beach in Tulum, saw reality show being filmed, tried to locate the world\'s only resort for fat people.

properties.name: Our attempt at a regular bar
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain461 Columbus Avenue, New York, NYFeaturing strange but friendly bartender Chris, good turkey burgers, too cold A/C.

properties.name: Our first apartment
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain33 greenwich avenue 10014where we enjoyed the patio, sunsets, grilling, a few parties, a blackout, June, Sing, Phil, Tim \'Are you Xpecting a delivery?\', and Bean

properties.name: Our first date
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain153 e 53rd street, new york, nyLunch at Houstons while playing hooky from work on September 26 2000. After watching Office Space. I had a hamburger, could not finish it until later.

properties.name: Our first karaoke
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain104 Bayard Street, New York, NYWhere Wylie wore leather pants and sang Sister Christian.

properties.name: Our first kiss
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain1467 first avenue, new york, nyAfter a softball game and several mind-erasers and 80\'s songs on jukebox.

properties.name: Our first real vacation
properties.description: Posted by Pdkainst. thomasWhere we ate in the pool, went sailing, met a family from Boston, went to the Soggy Dollar & Bomba\'s, saw the Queen\'s limousine, made an ill-fated trip to Carnival, and drank pain killers. When we returned, Wylie made a commemorative scrapbook.

properties.name: Our first vacation
properties.description: Posted by PdkainAfter Aaron\'s wedding, we drove to Las Vegas. Stayed awake all night during 2000 election. Ate at Circo, learned we cannot eat Snapper. Enjoyed breakfast buffet, met interesting cab drivers.

properties.name: Our kayaking lesson
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain63 Chelsea Piers, New York, NYWhere we learned the technique, then kayak\'d in the hudson river. Wasn\'t bad, but not good enough to warrant kayak purchase.

properties.name: Our wedding
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain29 east 19th street, new yorkWhere we will soon have the best night of our lives, with our friends and family, good music and the best bar food ever.

properties.name: PBR
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain7th Ave, New York, NYWe saw our first Professional Bull Riding Event. I had a hot dog and a pretzel. The baby was hungry. We ended up feeling worse for the riders than the bulls. The place smelled like dung.

properties.name: Phillies
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain1020 Pattison Avenue, Philadelphia, PAWent to 2 games. One at the old Veterans Stadium, with Jeff and Meg. Brought Wawa hogies. Second at the new Citizens Bank Park, vs. Red Sox. Phillies lost badly. Very hot both days.

properties.name: Poison Ivy Lodge
properties.description: Posted by PdkainWhere Cullen got married, I had poutine, and met Bibber. We returned for Maggie\'s honeymoon.

properties.name: Reach The Beach Finish Line
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain  , , NHWylie\'s favorite weekend, the race which she has diligently organized and run in, since 2003.

properties.name: Room At The River
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain30670 CR 371, Buena Vista, COWhere we went white-water rafting, mountain biking, met Cullen, Toner & Gus, and a group of Christian marriage counseling participants...Peg and her healing magnets, the McDonald\'s truck driver & his estitician wife, who probably should have gotten divorced.

properties.name: Ski House
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain, , VTWhere we spent four years skiing, playing board games, celebrating New Years, stealing the Red Fox sign, snowshoeing, making cereal bread, and punking Tim\'s trainer.

properties.name: Stanislaus National Forest
properties.description: Posted by Brrdcat3  19777 Greenley Road, Sonora, CA, 95370Stanislaus National Forest 209-532-3671

properties.name: Tatiana's School
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain 281 ninth avenue, new york, nyWhere Wylie spent two years with her little sister, doing her best to be a mentor and friend, and never giving up despite many challenges. Together we watched her graduate.

properties.name: Taxi
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain80 Fifth avenue, new york, nyWhere Wylie is head of new business, and has already brought in Blue Shield, Vs, Killian\'s & Wool, in just a few months. She deserves all the success in the world for her hard work, strategic insights, sharp presentation skills, and her ability to earn the respect and admiration of her coworkers.

properties.name: The Crab Shack
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain40 Estill Hammock Rd, Tybee Island, GAThis is where we told the Curtiss family that I was pregnant. I ordered a Sam Adams to throw them all off and then proposed a toast! They all said they knew and weren\'t at all fooled!

properties.name: The Daily Show
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain 513 W 54th street, new york, nyIt took a year to get tickets, but it was worth it. Saw Jon Stewart rip apart Bernard Goldberg for his book "100 People who are ruining america"

properties.name: The House That Got Away
properties.description: Posted by PdkainGlasco Turnpike. An old 1930\'s farmhouse that had been renovated, 4 acres of land and a pond on the property for the little one to learn ice hockey. Our offer wasn\'t even countered. :(

properties.name: The Landings
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain230 Yam Gandy Road, savannah, gaWhere I first heard Wylie\'s mom before I met her, say "Emily thomas white is on the phone." Had a clambake with no electricity. Went out, messed up golf cart. Returned many times. Played Boggle. Met hundreds of retired people.

properties.name: Valentine's Day 2007
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain72 west 69th street, new york, nyWe celebrated Valentine\'s Day at Telepan two nights early because of work and Peter\'s advertising class. Peter got a Happy Birthday piece of cake by mistake. It was delicious, as was my single glass of pinot grigio.

properties.name: Where I first met Maggie
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain5 avenue a, new york, nyThis may have also been "4 new messages" night. Then we went karaoke-ing at Winnie\'s.

properties.name: Where Wylie found Val
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain2336 Linden Blvd, Brooklyn, NYWho was rescued from a back yard, and hanging out by herself in a cage. She has entertained us with her jumping, laser-chasing, and variety of vocal sounds since May, 2005.

properties.name: Wogies
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain39 Greenwich Avenue, New York, NYBest cheesesteaks, Eagles bar, possibly the only restaurant in NY where they know us by name. Had them cater Wylie\'s surprise 30th birthday party on our old roof.

properties.name: World Trade Center
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain1 World Trade Center, New York, NYWhere we went to the outdoor observation deck Columbus day 2000, early in our relationship. I passed through it every day when commuting from Jersey City. Met in Union Square on Sept. 11th, halfway between my apt. and BBH, and watched as first tower collapsed.

properties.name: Wylie's apartment
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain194 east 2nd street new york, nywhere we had an awkward double date with Rob and Zarina, celebrated a New Years, and slept with the world\'s strangest stuffed animals--lamby and the burn victim

properties.name: the Catskills
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain146 Mt. Pleasant road, Mt. Tremper, NYWhere we first went on Johnnie Walker print shoot, flirted, drank in my motel room, stole a sign in Kingston, and later returned to Kate\'s Lazy Meadow, where we bbq\'d, played tennis, sat in hot tub, and looked at summer houses.

properties.name: the River cafe
properties.description: Posted by Pdkain 1 water street, brooklyn, nyWhere we had dinner on our anniversary, or valentine\'s day, can\'t remember which, then walked home over the brooklyn bridge
